title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Language Education Technology Development Course Using Participatory Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Theories and Experience with Language Teaching Tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop one or more VR-based language learning scenarios applying participatory design principles
Learners can derive three or more user requirements that may arise during educational technology design through teacher-learner collaboration.
Learners can propose improvements incorporating peer feedback using a prototype evaluation tool that operates in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
